name: Cirno's Strongest Shaved Ice Operation!
description:
Cirno is a game to make the strongest shaved ice.

【how to play】
Use the Z, X, C, V keys to spin a lot of ice shavings.
When the FEVER gauge is full, press the space key to FEVER!
The score multiplier will increase.
With 10 seconds left, you will be able to use all the keys on your keyboard!
Aim for a high score!

【gallery】
If you make a lot of shaved ice, customers will come to support you.
You can check the customers who came in the title gallery.
